item.title: Install beagle-lib for NVidia Tesla V100 on Debian buster
item.description: BEAGLE-LIB is a high-performance library to accelerate the calculations of Bayesian and Maximun Likelihood phylogenetics analyses. item.title: Install Nvidia CUDA in Debian Way
item.description: For Debian stable/Stretch Install NVidia driver in Linux server is always tedious and painful. Fortunatelly, Debian stable/Stretch provids ready-to-use NVidia drivers and CUDA toolkits. This post indicates the proper way to install up-to-date Nvidia driver and CUDA in Debian way. 1. Check repository source: For Debian stable/Stretch, the content of /etc/apt/sources.list file may looks like: deb http://ftp.debian.org/debian/ stretch main contrib non-free 2.
